member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO structure contains information to be passed to if dwMsgType is CMSG_SIGNED.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.cSigners
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgSigners array.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.rgSigners
member.summary: Array of pointers to structures each holding signer information.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.cCertEncoded
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgCertEncoded array.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.rgCertEncoded
member.summary: Array of pointers toCERT_BLOBstructures, each containing an encoded certificate.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.cCrlEncoded
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgCrlEncoded array.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.rgCrlEncoded
member.summary: Array of pointers toCRL_BLOB structures, each containing an encoded CRL.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.cAttrCertEncoded
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgAttrCertEncoded array. Used only if CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO_HAS_CMS_FIELDS is defined.

member.name: CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO.rgAttrCertEncoded
member.summary: Array of encoded attribute certificates. Used only if CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO_HAS_CMS_FIELDS is defined. This array of encoded attribute certificates can be used with CMS for PKCS #7 processing.
